home.tagline: Your AI-powered travel companion for unforgettable adventures around the world.
home.description: Plan your dream vacation with our intelligent travel assistant that creates personalized itineraries, finds the best deals, and helps you discover hidden gems.

about.title: About TravelingCooker
about.lead: We're passionate about making travel planning effortless and enjoyable for everyone.
about.whatWeDoDesc1: TravelingCooker takes the stress out of trip planning by handling every detail of your journey. From finding the perfect flights and accommodations to curating unique experiences and restaurant recommendations, we create complete travel itineraries tailored to your preferences.
about.whatWeDoDesc2: Our comprehensive approach means you can focus on what matters most - enjoying your trip. We handle the research, bookings, and coordination so you don't have to.
about.personalizedPlanningDesc: Every trip is unique. Our AI considers your interests, budget, travel style, and preferences to create itineraries that are perfectly tailored to you.
about.comprehensiveServiceDesc: From flights and hotels to activities and dining, we handle every aspect of your trip. No need to coordinate with multiple providers.
about.expertKnowledgeDesc: Our AI is trained on vast travel data and local insights to provide recommendations you won't find in typical guidebooks.
about.tellUsDesc: Share your destination, dates, interests, and budget. The more you tell us, the better we can personalize your experience.
about.weCreateDesc: Our AI analyzes your preferences and creates a detailed day-by-day itinerary with flights, accommodations, activities, and dining options.
about.enjoyDesc: Travel with confidence knowing every detail has been planned. Focus on making memories while we handle the logistics.
about.readyToStartDesc: Let us create the perfect trip for you. Complete planning from start to finish.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.lead: Have questions or need assistance? We're here to help you plan your perfect trip.
contact.getInTouchDesc: Whether you have questions about our services, need help with an existing booking, or want to provide feedback, our team is ready to assist you.
contact.quickSupportDesc: Need immediate assistance? Use our live chat feature or call us directly during business hours.

contact.subject: Subject

travelResults.title: Your Perfect Travel Plan is Ready!

plans.title: Choose Your AI Travel Planning Experience
plans.subtitle: Unlock the power of AI to create perfect travel plans. Each plan includes AI-generated itineraries, personalized recommendations, and smart travel insights.

wandererPro.name: Wanderer Pro
wandererPro.description: For frequent travelers and travel enthusiasts

businessTraveler.name: Business Traveler
businessTraveler.description: For travel agencies and business users

smartItinerary.title: Smart Itinerary Planning
smartItinerary.description: AI creates optimized daily schedules based on your preferences, time constraints, and local insights.

personalizedRecommendations.title: Personalized Recommendations
personalizedRecommendations.description: Get tailored suggestions for accommodations, activities, and dining based on your travel style and budget.

realTimeUpdates.title: Real-time Updates
realTimeUpdates.description: Stay informed with live price tracking, weather updates, and last-minute recommendations.

detailedGuides.title: Detailed Travel Guides
detailedGuides.description: Access comprehensive guides with local tips, cultural insights, and hidden gems discovered by AI.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.question1: How do AI travel plan credits work?
faq.answer1: Each credit allows you to generate one complete AI travel plan including itinerary, accommodations, activities, and recommendations. Credits reset monthly.
faq.question2: Can I upgrade or downgrade my plan?
faq.answer2: Yes! You can change your plan at any time. Upgrades take effect immediately, and downgrades apply at your next billing cycle.
faq.question3: What happens if I run out of credits?
faq.answer3: You can purchase additional credits or upgrade your plan. We'll notify you when you're running low on credits.
faq.answer4: We offer a 30-day money-back guarantee. If you're not satisfied, contact our support team for a full refund.

about.title: About TravelingCooker
about.lead: We're passionate about making travel planning effortless and enjoyable for everyone.

whatWeDo.title: What We Do
whatWeDo.paragraph1: TravelingCooker takes the stress out of trip planning by handling every detail of your journey. From finding the perfect flights and accommodations to curating unique experiences and restaurant recommendations, we create complete travel itineraries tailored to your preferences.
whatWeDo.paragraph2: Our comprehensive approach means you can focus on what matters most - enjoying your trip. We handle the research, bookings, and coordination so you don't have to.

whyChoose.title: Why Choose TravelingCooker
whyChoose.paragraph1: With years of travel experience and industry connections, we know what makes a trip truly special. Our team carefully selects each component of your journey to ensure quality, value, and unforgettable experiences.
whyChoose.paragraph2: We believe every traveler is unique, which is why we customize each itinerary to match your interests, budget, and travel style. No cookie-cutter packages - just personalized adventures designed for you.

flight.title: Flight Planning
flight.description: Best routes, optimal timing, and competitive prices for your journey

contact.title: Partner With Us
contact.lead: Join forces with TravelingCooker to grow your business and reach more travelers

partnerships.title: Business Partnerships & Opportunities
partnerships.description: TravelingCooker is always looking for strategic partnerships with hotels, airlines, restaurants, tour operators, and other travel-related businesses. We also welcome sponsorship opportunities and investment inquiries.

benefits.title: Partnership Benefits
benefits.benefit1: Access to our growing customer base
benefits.benefit2: Featured placement in our AI recommendations

contactInfo.response: Response Time: We typically respond within 24-48 hours
